Class JIPBmpFloat

java.lang.Object
  javavis.jip2d.base.JIPImage

          javavis.jip2d.base.bitmaps.JIPBmpFloat
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class JIPBmpFloat
extends JIPImgBitmap

Class to manage FLOAT type images. The data is float

See Also:
